text: ingan-ege jaeang-i iss-eun hu ha nanim-i geulo hayeogeum geubun-ui eunhye leul masboge hani igeos-eun naui neunglyeog ttaemun-iyo simpan-ui sigan-i olila saeng-gagji anihamyeo naega nae junimkke ileundamyeon naneun geubun-ege joh-eun geos eul gajil su issda lago geuneun malhal geos-ila geuleona hananim-eun bulsinjadeul ege geudeul-i haenghayeossdeon geos-eul allyeo jul geos-imyeo ttohan geubun-eun geudeul-ege gahoghan beol-eul julila
